data.title: Lossless Music Archives
data.text:
Fleetwood Mac – Rumours (1977) [2024, Blu-ray Audio + Hi-Res]

Blu-ray Audio | DTS-HD MA / Dolby TrueHD-Atmos | 24bit / 48kHz / 96kHz | Stereo & Multichannel

Hi-Res | FLAC Tracks / 24bit / 48kHz / 96kHz | Stereo & Multichannel

MKV File | Dolby TrueHD-Atmos | Multichannel

Full Scans Included

Total Size: 7.77 GB (BD) + 4.72 GB (Hi-Res) + 2.34 GB (MKV) | 3% RAR Recovery

Label: Warner | Cat#: 603497827336 | Genre: Pop Rock

RUMOURS comes with Dolby Atmos, DTS HD 5.1, and DTS HD Stereo mixes. Considered by many to be among the greatest albums of all time, winning the Grammy® Award for Album of the Year in 1978. The album includes the band’s first No.1 smash, “Dreams.” RUMOURS has been certified Double Diamond by the RIAA, selling more than 40 million copies worldwide. Continue reading “Fleetwood Mac – Rumours (1977) [2024, Blu-ray Audio + Hi-Res]”

Include Nat King Cole, Dinah Washington, Frank Sinatra, Peggy Lee, Mel Torme, Ella Fitzgerald, Anita O’Day, Bing Crosby, Sarah Vaughan, Perry Como, Betty Carter and many more Continue reading “Various Artists – Jazz Hits Of The 50s (2004) [Hi-Res SACD Rip]”

Joe Bonamassa – Live At The Hollywood Bowl With Orchestra (2024) [CD + Blu-ray + Hi-Res]

EAC Rip | FLAC Tracks + Cue + Log

Blu-ray | DTS-HD MA / LPCM | 24bit / 48kHz | Stereo & Multichannel

Hi-Res | FLAC Tracks / 24bit / 48kHz | Stereo & Multichannel

Full Scans Included

Total Size: 18.3 GB (BD) + 3.54 GB (Hi-Res) + 544 MB (CD) | 3% RAR Recovery

Label: J&R Adventures | EU | Cat#: JRA90718 | Genre: Blues Rock

In August 2023, Joe Bonamassa made his historic, first-ever appearance at the iconic Hollywood Bowl in his hometown of Los Angeles, where he was accompanied by a stellar ensemble of 40 orchestra members for a one-night-only event. Checking off another bucket list venue, Joe’s performance at the Bowl was his biggest production to date. Showcasing incredible orchestra arrangements from David Campbell, Trevor Rabin and Jeff Bova, fan-favorite songs are given new life on a much bigger scale. Continue reading “Joe Bonamassa – Live At The Hollywood Bowl With Orchestra (2024) [CD + Blu-ray + Hi-Res]”

Thin Lizzy – Vagabonds Of The Western World (1973)

[2023, 50th Anniversary, Blu-ray AUdio + Hi-Res]

Blu-ray Audio | DTS-HD MA / LPCM / Dolby TrueHD-Atmos | 24bit / 48kHz / 96kHz | Stereo & Multichannel

Hi-Res | FLAC Tracks / 24bit / 48kHz / 96kHz | Stereo & Multichannel

MKV File | Dolby TrueHD-Atmos | Multichannel

Total Size: 19.5 GB (BD) + 4.68 GB (Hi-Res) + 3.15 GB (MKV) | 3% RAR Recovery

Label: Decca | Cat#: 602455875327 | Genre: Hard Rock

2023 sees the 50th anniversary of what is widely regarded as Thin Lizzy’s breakthrough album ‘Vagabonds Of The Western World’ featuring their first UK top ten single ‘Whiskey In The Jar’ and ‘The Rocker’ which would go on to be one of the band’s signature tunes, so much so that it was the last song they ever performed at their final show in 1983. To celebrate the album’s golden anniversary, the Blu ray formats feature for the first time Atmos mixes. Continue reading “Thin Lizzy – Vagabonds Of The Western World (1973) [2023, 50th Anniversary, Blu-ray AUdio + Hi-Res]”

Van Morrison – Live At Orangefield (2024) [CD-Quality + Hi-Res]

[Official Digital Release]

Hi-Res / FLAC Tracks / 24bit / 48kHz | CD-Quality / FLAC Tracks / 16bit / 44.1kHz

Total Size: 1.45 GB | 3% RAR Recovery

Label: Orangefield Records | Genre: Jazz, Soul

The Christmas of 1959 saw Van Morrison take to the stage of Orangefield Secondary School for his first ever live performance. Midnight Special, a skiffle group, consisted of fellow pupils, John McCullough, tea-chest bass, Cyril Downey, guitar, Billy Ruth, guitar, and Walter Blakely on washboard with Van on guitar and vocals. In August 2014, Van Morrison returned to perform three shows as a fond farewell to his alma mater as it prepared to close its doors for the final time. Live at Orangefield is a specially curated album, of recordings from these very shows. Continue reading “Van Morrison – Live At Orangefield (2024) [CD-Quality + Hi-Res] [Official Digital Release]”

Pearl Jam – Dark Matter (2024) [Blu-ray Audio + Hi-Res]

Blu-ray Audio | LPCM / Dolby TrueHD-Atmos | 24bit / 48kHz | Stereo & Multichannel

Hi-Res | FLAC Tracks / 24bit / 48kHz | Stereo & Multichannel

MKV File | Dolby TrueHD-Atmos | Multichannel

Total Size: 11.5 GB (BD) + 1.85 GB (Hi-Res) + 2.67 GB (MKV)

Label: Monkeywrench Records | EU | Cat#: 602465084962 | Genre: Alternative Rock

Dark Matter arrives relatively quickly on the heels of Gigaton, an urgent warning call coincidentally delivered at the dawn of the COVID-19 pandemic. Teeming with apoplectic energy, Gigaton activated Pearl Jam’s collective muscle memory, tapping into the messianic fervor that ran through the band’s earliest records. Continue reading “Pearl Jam – Dark Matter (2024) [Blu-ray Audio + Hi-Res]”

Blue Öyster Cult – 50th Anniversary Live in NYC: Second Night (2024) [CD-Quality + Hi-Res]

[Official Digital Release]

Hi-Res / FLAC Tracks / 24bit / 44.1kHz | CD-Quality / FLAC Tracks / 16bit / 44.1kHz

Total Size: 1.90 GB

Label: Frontiers Records | Genre: Hard Rock

Blue Oyster Cult is set to release 50th Anniversary Live – Second Night in order to satisfy the overwhelming exciting for these concert events. This live album captures the band’s iconic performance of their second album, ‘Tyranny and Mutation,’ from their historic three-night run at Sony Hall, NYC, in September 2022. Continue reading “Blue Öyster Cult – 50th Anniversary Live in NYC: Second Night (2024) [CD-Quality + Hi-Res] [Official Digital Release]”

Bill Wyman – Drive My Car (2024) [CD-Quality + Hi-Res] [Official Digital Release]

Hi-Res / FLAC Tracks / 24bit / 96kHz | CD-Quality / FLAC Tracks / 16bit / 44.1kHz

Total Size: 0.99 GB

Label: BMG | Genre: Blues Rock

2024 album from legendary bassist Bill Wyman, who was bass guitarist for The Rolling Stones from 1962 to 1993 (briefly returning in 2023), and has performed as bassist for Bill Wyman’s Rhythm Kings since 1997. `Drive My Car’ is Bill Wyman’s first solo record since 2015’s ‘Back to Basics’ and the first solo album for BMG Continue reading “Bill Wyman – Drive My Car (2024) [CD-Quality + Hi-Res] [Official Digital Release]”
